title: Shen needs some help.
body: If Shen doesn't get MR per level because of his "free" shield, why does Riven get it with an even "free-er" shield?

True, but that doesn't help her early game. Shen's shield is a big part of his early game.

> [{quoted}](name=MrPerson10,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lQLrT0ZU,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2015-03-09T21:29:58.003+0000)
>
> True, but that doesn't help her early game. Shen's shield is a big part of his early game.

At rank 1, Riven's shield is 50% bigger than Shen's at rank 1, not factoring the 100% bonus AD ratio that Riven's gets, which can be anywhere from +10 to +25 depending on her runes, masteries and starting items. Shen's has a base amount and that's it unless he opts for an AP build.

Riven doesn't have a lot of AD to begin with, but yes her shield is bigger - she's also more mobile. 

Shen isn't nearly as mobile, but is far more tanky and does still have a shield with some built-in sustain.

It's a trade-off. At one point, Shen was by far a better general pick than Riven, people just like mobility over tankiness in most situations.

I love shen, a think a couple of small buffs could go a long way. I agree with the comparison with Riven's shield. I play both champions fairly regularly, but I'd like to see Shen's shield scale off of bonus hp or total hp. I'd also like to see Shen gain MR per level, those two small buffs i feel would put him in a really good spot in terms of balance and viability.
His kit though needs some updates in general though, since it is pretty Binary, and lacks strengths/weaknesses, counterplay, and synergy.

It is possible to be a ninja AND still be a tank, you just need to emphasize some other ninja qualities.

For instance, if say, Shen's movement speed wasn't so low, and he had some sort of stealth mechanic, or ability to quickly reposition. With slightly better CC, he could be plently ninja AND tank.

Being ninja isn't JUST about killing people. Ninja's were sabatour's and spies as well.

What if he got some kind of Vision thing? "Eye of Twilight?" Revealing stealthed/invisible units within a certain range?

There are plenty of ways to add "Ninja" to Shen without making him an assassin.
